data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Loughman, Zachary J. (2018): Cambarus polypilosus, a new species of stream-dwelling crayfish (Decapoda: Cambaridae) from the Western Highland Rim of Tennessee, USA.
